front: "Western" numerals (i.e. 0-9) are actually called Arabic numerals
The name "Muppet" was coined by Jim Henson. The word was made from a combination of the word "marionette" and "puppet."
Highway 9 in New York runs from Manhattan all the way to the capital city of Albany. You might know it better by its common name: Broadway.
45% of Americans don't know that the sun is a star.
Chuck Norris once heard nothing could kill him, so he tracked down nothing and killed it
